title: innalai ninaiyAdE
sahitya:
innalai ninaiyAdE manidA iDargaLai madiyAdE


anupallavi

  vanmanap-paghaivargaL unnuyir vATTinum vanjaka nenjinar nanjinai UTTinum


caraNam    nanmana sAkSiyai naNbanAi nambu nAnenum aghandai tAniDar vambu
 punnakaip-porumaiyAl annaiyin anbinAl pUraNanAgiya nAraNan sEvai sheivAi
